title: I can't play
body:
Hello everyone, when I log on to LoL, there should be the play button on the top left hand corner but for, there is only a progress bar. I've waited 30 min and it's still at 0%! What should I do?!
Thank you

replies.body: It seems like your patcher is trying to get you updated to the new patch but something is blocking it.  It may be a security setting blocking you from scanning game files to prep for the update.  Try the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help. Let me know if you have any questions!
